name: Hans' Quest
description:
This game is about Hans, a little slimeball, and his adventures.
It's really short and only takes 10 minutes.

Made by:
Tijn Edens -- Programming and design
Mark van der Veen -- Pixelart and design

Important controls:
Walk -- WASD
Shoot -- Left Mouse Button
Proceed dialogue -- Enter
Change weapon -- Scroll Wheel
